languages.text: Вольный Торговец доверил{mf||а} вопросы найма специалистов высшим офицерам. В знак их признательности были модернизированы компоненты макропушек по особой технологии пустотников — по слухам, за счет личных средств команды.

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец доверил{mf||а} вопросы найма специалистов высшим офицерам. В знак их признательности были модернизированы компоненты макропушек по особой технологии пустотников — по слухам, за счет личных средств команды.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader entrusted {mf|his|her} senior officers with the task of recruiting specialists. As a token of the officers' appreciation, components of the macro-cannons were upgraded with special voidfarer technology — rumoured to be at the crew's personal expense.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец доверил{mf||а} вопросы найма специалистов высшим офицерам. В знак их признательности были модернизированы компоненты макропушек по особой технологии пустотников — по слухам, за счет личных средств команды.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader entrusted {mf|his|her} senior officers with the task of recruiting specialists. As a token of the officers' appreciation, components of the macro-cannons were upgraded with special voidfarer technology — rumoured to be at the crew's personal expense.

The Rogue Trader entrusted {mf|his|her} senior officers with the task of recruiting specialists. As a token of the officers' appreciation, components of the macro-cannons were upgraded with special voidfarer technology — rumoured to be at the crew's personal expense.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} übertrug {mf|seinen|ihren} leitenden Offizieren, Spezialisten zu rekrutieren. Als Zeichen der Wertschätzung durch die Offiziere wurden Komponenten der Makrokanonen mit spezieller Raumfahrertechnologie verbessert – angeblich auf persönliche Kosten der Crew.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader entrusted {mf|his|her} senior officers with the task of recruiting specialists. As a token of the officers' appreciation, components of the macro-cannons were upgraded with special voidfarer technology — rumoured to be at the crew's personal expense.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} übertrug {mf|seinen|ihren} leitenden Offizieren, Spezialisten zu rekrutieren. Als Zeichen der Wertschätzung durch die Offiziere wurden Komponenten der Makrokanonen mit spezieller Raumfahrertechnologie verbessert – angeblich auf persönliche Kosten der Crew.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a confié le recrutement de spécialistes à ses officiers supérieurs. En remerciement, l'équipage aurait payé pour améliorer certains composants des macro-canons avec une technologie stellaire.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader entrusted {mf|his|her} senior officers with the task of recruiting specialists. As a token of the officers' appreciation, components of the macro-cannons were upgraded with special voidfarer technology — rumoured to be at the crew's personal expense.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a confié le recrutement de spécialistes à ses officiers supérieurs. En remerciement, l'équipage aurait payé pour améliorer certains composants des macro-canons avec une technologie stellaire.

languages.text: 行商浪人将招募专业船员的工作全权委托给{mf|他|她}的高阶军官。所有军官都感激{mf|他|她}的决定，购买了特殊的技术设备，升级了宏炮的部件。据说，所有升级费用都是由众多军官共同出资赞助的。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader entrusted {mf|his|her} senior officers with the task of recruiting specialists. As a token of the officers' appreciation, components of the macro-cannons were upgraded with special voidfarer technology — rumoured to be at the crew's personal expense.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人将招募专业船员的工作全权委托给{mf|他|她}的高阶军官。所有军官都感激{mf|他|她}的决定，购买了特殊的技术设备，升级了宏炮的部件。据说，所有升级费用都是由众多军官共同出资赞助的。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente confió a sus oficiales veteranos la tarea de reclutar especialistas. Como agradecimiento, se mejoraron componentes de los macrocañones con tecnología especial de los viajeros del vacío. Según los rumores, la tripulación cubrió los costes.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader entrusted {mf|his|her} senior officers with the task of recruiting specialists. As a token of the officers' appreciation, components of the macro-cannons were upgraded with special voidfarer technology — rumoured to be at the crew's personal expense.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente confió a sus oficiales veteranos la tarea de reclutar especialistas. Como agradecimiento, se mejoraron componentes de los macrocañones con tecnología especial de los viajeros del vacío. Según los rumores, la tripulación cubrió los costes.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーは専門家の採用を、上級士官たちに任せた。士官たちのお礼として、マクロキャノンの一部が特別な虚空渡りの技術で改良された。噂では、その費用はクルー自身が負担したという。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader entrusted {mf|his|her} senior officers with the task of recruiting specialists. As a token of the officers' appreciation, components of the macro-cannons were upgraded with special voidfarer technology — rumoured to be at the crew's personal expense.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは専門家の採用を、上級士官たちに任せた。士官たちのお礼として、マクロキャノンの一部が特別な虚空渡りの技術で改良された。噂では、その費用はクルー自身が負担したという。

languages.text: Hür Tacir, uzmanları işe alma görevini kendisinin kıdemli subaylarına devretti. Subayların takdirinin bir göstergesi olarak da makro topların bileşenleri, özel gemici teknolojisiyle geliştirildi. Bu yükseltmenin, mürettebatın kişisel harcamalarıyla gerçekleştirildiği söyleniyor.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader entrusted {mf|his|her} senior officers with the task of recruiting specialists. As a token of the officers' appreciation, components of the macro-cannons were upgraded with special voidfarer technology — rumoured to be at the crew's personal expense.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, uzmanları işe alma görevini kendisinin kıdemli subaylarına devretti. Subayların takdirinin bir göstergesi olarak da makro topların bileşenleri, özel gemici teknolojisiyle geliştirildi. Bu yükseltmenin, mürettebatın kişisel harcamalarıyla gerçekleştirildiği söyleniyor.
